channel.title: Project P-317
channel.description:
[b][i]Firstly, a little info.[/i][/b]
I have decided to make a private server from the base up, correctly.
The project name, Project P-317 came from the thought of handling packets correctly using a 317 server and client. there for Project Packet-317.
I have only just decided to make it because i have been waiting for Miss. Silabsoft and Moparisthebest to realse there 317 server and renamed client.
[b][i]Now A little bit on the server.[/i][/b]
Its going to handle packets properly, unlike the WL packet handling, packet handling will be based on the packet handling by the RSCD team.
All data will be saved to a SQL data base running on my local server. This way i can host a SQL based registration, and highscores for everyone to be able to view.
[b][i]Looking for..[/i][/b] Client Refractorer. (Post to help.) Any additonial help coding the server. (Post to help.) Full packet dump for the 317 client. (Please post the dump or upload in an attachment.)
[b][i]Contact.[/i][/b] If you wish to contact me, talk to me on msn. (will only accept people that have posted.) Msn - Sambo1992@hotmail.co.uk
I will be keeping this updated. This is a large project, and im hoping i can acomplish it.
[i]Thanks Grungy.[/i]

Ill help, i dont know how helpfull ill be, but ill try non the less.
